name: Facility Outbreak
description:
This game is a simple top-down view shooter.

The main purpose of the game is to sustain light and prevent enemies from killing you.

Developers : Alejandro - Programmer - @APacmanYT - Twitter

Sentinel Protocol - Developer / Music Designer - @sentinelpotato - Twitter

Controls-

WASD - Movement.

E - Press buttons.

ESCAPE - Pause the game.

LMB - Shoot.

This game was created for the Brackeys Game Jam

DevLog---

v1.1 ---------

- Fixed Music/Volume Glitch;

- Fixed Wave 1 Bug;
